SELECT * FROM asgard_quartz_task WHERE 1 = 1
AND name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND status LIKE concat(concat('%',#{status}),'%')
AND description LIKE concat(concat('%',#{description}),'%')
AND fd_level = #{level}
AND source_id = #{sourceId}
AND( name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR description LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') OR status LIKE concat(concat('%',#{param}),'%') )
order by case status when 'ENABLE' then 1 when 'FINISHED' then 2 when 'DISABLE' then 3 end, id desc

SELECT aqt.id, aqt.execute_params AS params, aqt.name, aqt.description, aqt.start_time, aqt.execute_strategy, aqt.end_time, aqt.trigger_type, aqt.simple_repeat_count, aqt.simple_repeat_interval, aqt.simple_repeat_interval_unit, aqt.cron_expression, aqm.service AS serviceName, aqt.execute_method AS methodCode FROM asgard_quartz_task aqt LEFT JOIN asgard_quartz_method aqm ON aqt.execute_method = aqm.code WHERE aqt.id = #{id}
